subject: Missing items. Order Number SSN2613
description_text:
Hi guys.
I have recirved most of my delivery's.
My pro pedals showed up last week and my haptic motors were here on Friday.

I am still missing my pro handbreak and pro shifter.
I have checked the tracking number which was provided.
But the tracking number is not working.

Could I ask for an update on an  expected delivery date.
As they both seem to have not been shipped.

Just to confirm,
I have recieved my pro pedals and my haptic motors.
But i am still missing the pro hand break and pro shifter.

ORDER NUMBER........SSN2613

Any help you could provide , would be greatly appreciated .

Kind regards.

Robin

conversations.body_text: Hi Robin Friel,    We regret to inform you that the SQ Pro shifter is currently out of stock. We shall dispatch the HB Pro handbrake to you in the interim. We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Should you wish to cancel the SQ Pro shifter order, please do let us know.

Hi .

Thankyou for your quick response in the matter .
I appreciate your help in sending out the pro handbreak.

I would like to keep my order for the pro shifter . As i am very happy with
the quality of the products .

Could you advise me as to when the shifter will be back in stock and when I
may recieve the shifter pro.

Your help is greatly appreciated.
Thankyou again .

Kind regards .
Robin.

On Mon, 22 Sept 2025, 07:47 service@simsonn.com,
Hello, thank you for your trust in us and your appreciation of our products. We are currently upgrading them and expect to have stock available in mid-October.

Hi Simmson.

No problem at all. I appreciate you informing me.

I am happy to wait untill mid October.

Could I ask that you update me when stock is available?
And when the expected items will arrive .

Thankyou again for your help in this matter.

Look forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards

Robin.

    (Studio 86)
Creator network.


On Tue, 23 Sept 2025, 11:14 service@simsonn.com,
